violations.description: Failure path consumes full 60s test timeout because readiness gating happens only through UI waits.
violations.suggestion: Short-circuit with backend readiness polling before entering 15s UI visibility assertions.

violations.description: Sequential text assertions on same locator delay failure discovery when partner state is not ready.
violations.suggestion: First assert branch marker (`partner complete`) then run per-row assertions.

recommendations: Add readiness polling to fail fast on unmet partner-state conditions.
Reorder assertions to detect wrong branch immediately.
Keep full parallelism but isolate state-heavy scripture scenarios by worker account.
summary: Performance is generally good; failures are expensive due to late branch detection and full timeout consumption.
